res_pal <- colorNumeric( palette = "Blues", domain = pge_covid$KBTU_change ) leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>% addPolygons( data = pge_covid, fillColor = ~res_pal(KBTU_change), color = "white", opacity = 0.5, fillOpacity = 0.5, weight = 1, label = ~paste0( round(KBTU_change), "% Change in Energy Consumption from March-June 2019 - 2020 by Zipcode ", ZIPCODE ), highlightOptions = highlightOptions( weight = 2, opacity = 1 ) ) %>% addLegend( data = pge_covid, pal = res_pal, values = ~KBTU_change, title = "Percentage Change in Residential Electric Energy Use
During COVID-19" )
